collection:
We may collect, use, store, and transfer different kinds of personal data
about you which we have grouped together as follows:

  * Identity Data includes first name, last name, username or similar identifier.

* Technical Data includes internet protocol (IP) address, your login data, browser type and version, time zone setting and location, browser plug-in types and versions, operating system and [platform](https://aifrontier.info/kiem-tien-cung-ai-chien-luoc-platform-cua-nvidia-voi-cuda/), and other technology on the devices you use to access this website.
sharing:
Disclosure of Your Personal Data**

We may share your personal data with external third parties for the purposes
of operating our website, providing our services to you, and for legal
compliance.
